entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 01:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
